tweet_text:
@agodlypancake @WrenOkay @MD_Mithra00 @crusaderphly3 @fawfulfan So you're just bigoted against poor people?

Because that's the majority of who uses public transportation by necessity, especially when it's as shitty as the US. The people with money will pay to avoid it unless and until it improves.

tweet_text:
And as I grow older, I learned in school that we as seekers of knowledge, should try to avoid consuming food and drinks that are syubhah; in other words, we are uncertain of its halal status.

As it affects our memory and the barakah in seeking knowledge.
text_en: And as I grow older, I learned in school that we as seekers of knowledge, should try to avoid consuming food and drinks that are syubhah; in other words, we are uncertain of its halal status. As it affects our memory and the barakah in seeking knowledge.

tweet_text: @CaptinDeckerSTR Are you scared of all vaccines, or just this one? I got two shots of AstraZeneca six months ago. Minor head ache and tiredness—like any vaccine! That's literally how you know your immune system is working.
